channel.title: Client Color
channel.description:
Hey guys.. so all I basically want to know how to do is change the client's color from this red:
[IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/9098/59416006.png[/img]
To this black: (the themes tab in the top right corner allows me to change the clients color too but I want to make the black the default color)
[IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/8189/33126153.png[/img]

item.title: Client Color
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

In gui.java (or EGUI, differs with clients), search for:

public void initUI()

A few lines down, you should see:

UIManager.setLookAndFeel("org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel");

Replace that line with:

UIManager.setLookAndFeel("org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceRavenGraphiteGlassLookAndFeel");

Method names could differ depending upon your client, but if you just search for the theme names you should be able to find it.

Read full topic
